newsitem.title: SWEDEN: Fire ravages Indonesia envoy's Sweden residence.
newsitem.headline: Fire ravages Indonesia envoy's Sweden residence.

text.p: Fire ripped through the residence of Indonesia's ambassador to Sweden on Thursday.
Police said the large wooden house would have been virtually gutted by the time the blaze was brought under control later on Thursday.
One person was taken to hospital suffering from smoke inhalation suffered during the fire, in the attractive and leafy Stockholm suburb of Lidingo.
Some 50 firefighters were on the scene trying to bring the fire under control. Everyone had escaped from the house, police said.
The Swedish news agency TT quoted the wife of Jakarta's ambassador to Sweden as saying no threats had been received.
